overview_of_class: This course introduces students to the physical, chemical and biological components of the Earth system that interact to regulate Earth's surface environment and how these processes have changed through time. Emphasis of the course is on the co-evolution of the Earth and life through geologic time and the couplings and feedbacks responsible for regulating Earth surface conditions.
name: Earth System History
title: WCAS EARTH 203-0-01 Earth System History
